sourcesContent:
import React, { Fragment, useEffect, useState } from 'react'; import './profile.css'; function Profile(props) { const [basicInfo, setBasicInfo] = useState({}); const [user, setUser] = useState({}) let url = `http://localhost:8000/api/users/${user.id}/`; useEffect(() => { setUser(JSON.parse(localStorage.getItem('user'))) fetch(url, { headers: { 'Accept': 'application/json', 'Content-Type': 'application/json' }, method: "PUT", body: JSON.stringify(basicInfo) }) .then(res => console.log(res)) .catch(error => console.log(error)) }) console.log(user.id) function submitHandler(event) { event.preventDefault(); setBasicInfo({ firstName: event.target.children[1].value, lastName: event.target.children[3].value, email: (event.target.children[5].value === event.target.children[7].value) ? event.target.children[5].value : null, password: (event.target.children[9].value === event.target.children[11].value) ? event.target.children[9].value : null }) setTimeout(()=> { event.target.children[1].value = ''; event.target.children[3].value = ''; event.target.children[5].value = ''; event.target.children[7].value = ''; event.target.children[9].value = ''; event.target.children[11].value = ''; },1000) } console.log(basicInfo) return (

First Name

{user.firstName}

Last Name

{user.lastName}

Email

{user.email}

Password

{user.password}







 ); } export default Profile;
